channel.title: A website from the future?
channel.description:
By mistake, I went to [url='https://blackmesasource.com']https://blackmesasource.com/[/url] instead of the [url='https://www.blackmesasource.com']www[/url] version. The non www version looks more modern. It mentions the 2nd release on steam, and apparently, it implies that it won't be free. And the Copyright at the end, says 2014. Interesting...
Probably old news, but couldn't find any mention in the forums

item.title: A website from the future?
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Already discussed ad infinitum here: https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12261

Read full topic
